channel.title: Free hosting
channel.description: [center] [size=14pt][b]I don't no if I'm correct posting here, so bare with me here,as I thought this was Classified as help as I'm helping people host. Hey, I can Host any server you would like for free. all I'm asking is hosting Status in game. here are the specifications to get this free host. The Server must have a Forum and a Home Page. You must have a WebClient. If you are interested please Comment bellow and we can work something out, I can easly host about 3 servers free of charge.[/b][/size] Here are one of my Server Hosting Specs: [img]http://www.runescape.do.am/specs.png[/img] [img]http://www.runescape.do.am/specs2.png[/img] Post bellow if your interested or need anymore information.[/center]

item.title: Free hosting
item.dc:creator: @infexisgoat infexisgoat
item.description:
@infexisgoat wrote:

[center]
[size=14pt]I don’t no if I’m correct posting here, so bare with me here,as I thought this was Classified as help as I’m helping people host.
Hey, I can Host any server you would like for free. all I’m asking is hosting Status in game.
here are the specifications to get this free host.
The Server must have a Forum and a Home Page.
You must have a WebClient.
If you are interested please Comment bellow and we can work something out, I can easly host about 3 servers free of charge.[/size]
Here are one of my Server Hosting Specs:


Post bellow if your interested or need anymore information.[/center]
